doc.title: Ai jiu zhai yi qi
doc.plot: Superstar, Zhuang Jun Nan aka Mars, has hit a low streak when a series of negative publicity hit mainstream leaving him with no where to go and no where to live. Downsizing on everything in his life, the idol must show good faith by returning to school (college) and renting a room for himself living with two very distinctive sisters. Lucky for Mars, he ends up renting a room to one of his school classmates, Momo Chen. Everything turns upside down for Momo when Mars enters her simple yet peaceful life. This agoraphobic homebody suddenly grows a backbone when confronting the idol, which have some idolize fans unhappy with her.
